text:
“I was surprised to read that winre.wim was on the first partition(left of the
os). 
* Installation media after and including Win10 2004 was supposed to fix/ensure
 Recovery partition was after the Windows partition.” 
This was also an issue in some versions of earlier versions, like Windows
 Server 2019 but has been fixed over time. 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
Von:  <
%244e324d40%24ea96e7c0%24%40chynet.de

metadata.subject: AW: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft
metadata.email_text_original:
Sie erhalten nicht oft eine E-Mail von mailtome@chynet.de. Erfahren Sie, warum
dies wichtig ist [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
“I was surprised to read that winre.wim was on the first partition(left of the
os). 
* Installation media after and including Win10 2004 was supposed to fix/ensure
   Recovery partition was after the Windows partition.” 
This was also an issue in some versions of earlier versions, like Windows
   Server 2019 but has been fixed over time. 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
Von: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/000101da48b9%244e324d40%24ea96e7c0%24%40chynet.de
